greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array T(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where T(n,k) = Sum_{j=0..n} 2^j * binomial(n,j)^k.
comment: Column k is the diagonal of the rational function 1 / (Product_{j=1..k} (1-x_j) - 2 * Product_{j=1..k} x_j) for k>0.
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Sum[2^j * Binomial[n, j]^k, {j, 0, n}]; Table[T[k, n-k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 01 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 11 2020
